name: Roundtable for Europe's Energy Future
goal: The Roundtable for Europe's Energy Future is an innovative platform of leading energy companies (TSOs, DSOs and producers), which aims at contributing to the development of an interconnected European grid with empowered markets and consumers.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
EU 2030 climate and energy package
2050 long-term strategy
EU Energy Union
EU initiative on electricity market design
EU initiative on electricity retail markets
EU legislation and policy initiatives on energy infrastructure
Reform of EU ETS
